title: Microsoft musical instruments (PC)
brief_description: You’re about to enter one of the world’s largest music studios, filled with musical instruments from every cornerr of the earth - and you can play any one you want. Just click the mouse to learn about how an instrument works, hear music examples, or listen to music of all types and origins. Children can master it quickly and adults will will be so captivated they’ll want to play for hours. For music lovers the world over. SYSTEM REQUIREMERNTS: a mulitmeedia PC; 386SX or higher processor; 2 Mb of RAM; 30 Mb hard disk; audio board; VGA or VHA + display; CD-ROM drive; Microsoft Windows 3.1 or later; MS-DOS 3.1 or later; MS-DOS CD-ROM extensions (MSCDEX) version 2.2 or later (provided with your CD-ROM drive).
